title: Tech and Soc Change Americas West Africa 1450-1750

content.question: In the period circa 1450–1750, economic exchanges played an important role in shaping the interactions between European, African, and Native American societies in the Atlantic world. Develop an argument that evaluates the extent to which Native American and/or West African societies changed as a result of their increased economic interactions with Europe during this period.

frqParts.text: In the period circa 1450–1750, economic exchanges played an important role in shaping the interactions between European, African, and Native American societies in the Atlantic world. Develop an argument that evaluates the extent to which Native American and/or West African societies changed as a result of their increased economic interactions with Europe during this period.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
